Content: Differently tiered pops may demand, or need access to different goods.
In general a higher tier would have the luxury demands of the lower one
as a need, without it it would rebel. So a worker might wish for a
kitchen, a manager for a rare wine and a noble man for a miniaturized

sun.
In the case of hive minds everything is likley a need: drones
get nutrient slime, princes royal gellee and overlords special building
